members.name: PeriodicWave.PeriodicWave()
members.description: Creates a new PeriodicWave instance using the default values for all properties. If you wish to establish custom property values at the outset, use the AudioContext.createPeriodicWave() factory method instead.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A BaseAudioContext representing the audio context you want the node to be associated with.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: A PannerOptions dictionary object defining the properties you want the PannerNode to have (It also inherits the options defined in the PeriodicWaveConstraints dictionary.): real: A Float32Array containing the cosine terms that you want to use to form the wave (equivalent to the real parameter of AudioContext.createPeriodicWave). imag: A Float32Array containing the sine terms that you want to use to form the wave (equivalent to the imag parameter of AudioContext.createPeriodicWave).
